participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, enjoys music and baking.
participant_1.background: I had a hard time finding a job that fit my needs and skills. I will not talk about my favorite food with others. While my parents are of an older generation, my music taste is contemporary and eclectic. I celebrated my birthday with my family and friends by listening to Taylor Swift's music and eating my favorite foods. I lie to my children about eating healthy.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and fun-loving, loves cooking and music.
participant_2.background: I've been singing in the shower more often lately, and it's been a lot of fun! I once pretended to be a sports fan and told the cop I was on my way to a game. I cook every night. I have more than 10 tattoos. My longest relationship was four years.

content.text: What are some of your favorite things to do for fun?
I love to cook and sing! I have been singing in the shower a lot lately. What about you?
I love to listen to music and bake. I'm a big fan of Taylor Swift!
That's awesome! I love Taylor Swift too! She's so talented.
I know, right? I'm so excited for her new album!
Me too! I'm going to be listening to it on repeat all day.
I can't wait! What's your favorite Taylor Swift song?
It's hard to choose, but I think I'd have to say "Blank Space".
That's a good one! Mine is probably "All Too Well".
That's a great song too! I love the lyrics.
I know, right? They're so sad, but they're so beautiful.
I think that's what makes them so good.
